smartblocks.shapes
Class Box

java.lang.Object
  smartblocks.shapes.Box
All Implemented Interfaces:
Shape
Direct Known Subclasses:
Circle
public class Box
extends java.lang.Object
implements Shape

A rectangle used for shape bounds. It cannot be rotated

Author:
David FUENMAYOR

Field Summary
protected  float angle
          Angle of rotation of this Box
protected  float area
          Area of this Box = width*height
protected  Vector2D centroid
          Coordinates of the center of this Box with respect to the upper-left corner of this box
protected  Vector2D offset
          Distance of the upper-left corner of this box to the origin of the world's coordinate system aka computer screen
protected  Vector2D size
          Width (size.x) and height (size.y) of this block
protected  Vector2D[] vertices
          The four vertices of this Box, being the first one its the upper-left corner and following then counterclockwise
